thread.title: Dinner at the Westbridge -
thread.title_full: Dinner at the Westbridge - Review of The Westbridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Alison M
title: Dinner at the Westbridge -
text: My parents were staying at a hotel near the Westbridge, we didn't want to walk far for dinner and decided to go to the Westbridge. It was an absolute treat, I am surprised that it wasn't busier. Very good value, great tasting food and unintrusive service, add to that that it is a BYO and I know I will be returning. Would highly recommend going here, if you don't fancy going to one of the multitude of chain restaurants in Westfields.
